data.title: 3 Top Qualities of A Good Neighborhood
meta_keywords: Top Features of A Good Neighborhood
data.meta_description: Finding a good neighborhood is a key component of your house hunting process, but what exactly makes a neighborhood good? These are the most important factors.
data.text:
As you embark on your search for your dream home, don’t overlook the importance of selecting the perfect neighborhood to call home. After all, your zip code can play a pivotal role in shaping your lifestyle, from your daily commute to your family's social activities. But what makes a neighborhood great? Here are three top factors to consider when making your decision.

1. Low Crime Rate

Imagine living in a community where you could let your guard down and relax. A place where you don't have to worry about the safety of your loved ones or prized possessions. That's the power of a low crime rate. Whether you're a city slicker or a suburbanite, knowing that your neighborhood is safe can offer tremendous peace of mind. With crime maps offered by local government and police department websites, you can research crime rates in various areas and make informed decisions about where to call home.

2. Excellent Schools

Schools can be a real drawcard for families searching for a place to call home. With safety being a top priority, neighborhoods with low crime rates and easy access to schools are often the most desirable. Luckily, GreatSchools.org is here to help you find the perfect education fit for your little ones.

3. Nearby Essentials

A good neighborhood should offer more than just a picturesque view. Life is all about convenience, after all. Rather than traveling far and wide to find the essentials, a top-tier neighborhood should make things easy for you. That includes having everything from grocery stores, boutiques, cinemas, and eateries just a stone's throw away. In a well-located neighborhood, a quick errand run will be a breeze.

Where to Look?

If you’re itching for a change of scenery but feeling overwhelmed by the thought of picking a new place to call home, fear not. Our arsenal of tools and intel will not only show you the ins and outs of different neighborhoods across the U.S. but also what makes each one special. Explore the Pulte Homes blog or new construction homes around the nation to get more information.

Ready to Start Searching?
